formulas.name: Q4_Answer_Floramite
formulas.expression: if({!Q4_Floramite}="when there is attack of spotted mites and Mites","correct",if({!Q4_Floramite}="None","No responce","Incorrect"))

formulas.name: Q4_Answer_Mastamite
formulas.expression: if({!Q4_Mastamite}="when there is attack of mites","Correct",if({!Q4_Pilatus}="None","No response","Incorrect"))

formulas.name: Q4_Answer_Provax
formulas.expression: if({!Q4_In_which_stage_of_the_crop_can_this_product_be_used}="Before sowing Seeds ( Seed Treatment for Healthy Crops)","Correct","Incorrect")

formulas.name: Q5_Answer_Pilatus
formulas.expression: if({!Q5_Pilatus}="Natural extracts, fulvic acid, amino acids and inositol","Yes","No")
